features.featureTitle: Create a Homepage that mirrors incometax.gov.in's design, layout, and color scheme. Include a hero banner with the official portal branding (blue/navy and saffron/orange colors, Ashoka emblem, 'Income Tax Department - Government of India' header), a marquee/ticker for news & updates, and quick-access tiles for major services (e-Filing, Tax Calculator, Forms, PAN/TAN, Refund Status).

Build a top navigation bar matching the official incometax.gov.in structure with dropdown menus for: Home, About Us, e-Filing (ITR Filing, View Filed Returns, Upload Form 16), Tax Services (Tax Calculator, Form 26AS, AIS), Forms (ITR-1 through ITR-7, Form 15G/15H), Downloads, Help & FAQ. All items that require official login must open the corresponding URL on incometax.gov.in in a new tab.

Build a Tax Calculator page supporting both Old Regime and New Regime for FY 2024-25 (AY 2025-26). Include inputs for annual income, age group (below 60, 60-80, above 80), deductions under 80C/80D/80TTA/HRA (Old Regime only), and display a detailed tax breakdown (gross income, deductions, taxable income, tax slabs, surcharge, health & education cess at 4%, and net tax payable). Show a side-by-side comparison of both regimes.

Create an ITR Forms Directory page listing all ITR forms (ITR-1 Sahaj, ITR-2, ITR-3, ITR-4 Sugam, ITR-5, ITR-6, ITR-7) with a brief description of who should use each form and direct download/view links pointing to the official incometax.gov.in forms page.

Create a PAN/TAN Services section page listing PAN-related services: Apply for New PAN (links to NSDL/UTI portal), Apply for Changes/Correction in PAN, Link PAN with Aadhaar, PAN Verification, Apply for TAN, TAN Verification. Each service card must have a description and a button linking to the respective official government URL (incometax.gov.in, onlineservices.nsdl.com, or tin.tin.nsdl.com as appropriate).

Create a Refund Status page that shows instructions on how to check income tax refund status, and includes a prominent button/link directing users to the official NSDL refund status portal (tin.tin.nsdl.com/oltas/refundstatuslogin.html) and the incometax.gov.in e-Filing portal. Display informational steps: how long refunds take, common reasons for delay, and helpline numbers.

Add a News & Updates section (also appearing as a ticker on the homepage) that displays recent announcements relevant to income tax, such as filing deadlines, new circulars, and regime changes for FY 2024-25. Content should be static but realistic, mirroring the style of the official portal's updates feed. Include a 'View All' link pointing to https://www.incometax.gov.in/iec/foportal/.

Add a prominent 'Login to e-Filing Portal' button on the homepage and in the navigation that redirects users to https://eportal.incometax.gov.in/iec/foservicesapp/#/login in a new tab. Also add a 'Register' link redirecting to https://eportal.incometax.gov.in/iec/foservicesapp/#/register. The existing internal login/register pages can be retained for the app's own user management but the primary CTA should clearly link to the official portal.

Update the TanStack Router routes to include the new pages: /home (or update / to serve as the portal homepage), /tax-calculator, /itr-forms, /pan-tan-services, /refund-status, /news-updates. Ensure the PortalLayout wraps all pages and navigation links work correctly between internal pages.

Add a disclaimer banner/strip visible on every page stating: 'This is an informational companion app. For official tax filing and government services, visit incometax.gov.in.' with a clickable link. Style it in a government-notice style (amber/yellow background with dark text).
